summary: Added missing BeautyBooking factories and DB tables (storages, translations, business_settings, product_id on retail orders, status on badges). Ran module migrations. Switched vendor auth in tests to vendor.auth_token. Adjusted factories to match schema. Routes still returning 404/401 for vendor API tests; route discovery hindered (route:list triggers Gateways constructor). Tests currently fail due to 404 responses.
current_status: Vendor API tests still failing (404). Need to confirm vendor API route prefixes/availability and possibly bypass problematic route:list; verify vendor.api middleware auth_token logic and ensure routes are loaded.
